Title: Synchro
Description: VB.NET software to synchronize folders. The control included can be reused in other applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
VB.NET software to synchronize folders. The control included can be reused in other applications.

Source code includes the CGAnimation project http://www.codeproject.com/KB/miscctrl/CGAnimation.aspx by Martin Cook and a VB.NET translation of the Command Line Arguments Parser http://www.codeproject.com/KB/recipes/command_line.aspx by R. Lopes.

An article about Synchro is available on CodeProject http://www.codeproject.com/KB/cpp/Synchro.aspx.


The installer setup file (.aip) is for Advanced Installer. The .ail file is the associated language file for French setup.
The documentation has been built by Sandcastle Help File Builder from the .shfb file. The file obtained is in /Help.
/Help.fr and /Help.eng contain necessary files to build compiled HTML help with HTML Help Workshop. .chm resulting files must be put into /App/bin (English version) and /App/bin/fr (French version). To do so, first build the solution in Visual Studio to create /App/bin folder, change the targets in HTML Help workshop and then compile the help files.
